name: Greg Spring
description:
Greg Spring is a simple, challenging and addictive game. The Game looks easy at first glance, but soon enough you will see that it isn't.

You're going to control the metal spring called Greg Spring, which is on a conveyor belt. You can't let yourself be carried away by it and you should be careful with the screws that come toward you. You can't touch the screws, the only alternative is to jump over them. Each screw you jump over successfully, a point is scored. So, try to score as many points as you can!

PS: The screws call themselves the Screw Crew.

How to Play:

- Click to jump

- Click, hold and release to jump higher (the longer you hold the higher you'll jump)
